title: Tip #12 Nuts about…nuts
author: Tom Price
content: Nuts. They’re great food, good nutrition, all that stuff. But, swear to Gaia it’s like those shells were engineered to blend into the ground. Please: be careful with your nut shells, They are in the top 3 of MOOP found on the Playa. What’s #1 and #2? Stay tuned. – Blue
